tasks.label: Switch to Local Development Mode
args: echo '{"go.buildTags": "local", "gopls": {"buildFlags": ["-tags=local"]}, "go.toolsEnvVars": {"GOFLAGS": "-tags=local"}}' > .vscode/settings.json && echo 'Switched to local development mode. Please reload VS Code window (Cmd+Shift+P -> Developer: Reload Window)'

tasks.label: Switch to Production Mode
args: echo '{"go.buildTags": "", "gopls": {"buildFlags": []}, "go.toolsEnvVars": {"GOFLAGS": ""}}' > .vscode/settings.json && echo 'Switched to production mode. Please reload VS Code window (Cmd+Shift+P -> Developer: Reload Window)'
